name: Captain Kalani Definitive Edition
description:
Capitán Kalani it’s a 2D action platformer game inspired in the old NES games, having big influence in titles like Batman, Megaman, Shatterhand and others. The history is set in a future where the life is comfortable above the clouds and the machines are a big part of the daily basis.

Taking inspiration from the old NES games, the difficulty scales considerably, the mechanics are the basics of any platformer, with one exception: you will lose some of your abilities as you progress.

The game is divided into 5 episodes, each one with a different aesthetic and set; You have a life counter that, when it runs out, will return you to the beginning of the level where you are, so be very careful.

The music is 8 bit chiptune, very nostalgic. connect your CRT monitor and transport yourself to the 80's
